usage: claude-monitor [-h] [--plan {pro,max5,max20,custom}]
                      [--view {realtime,daily,monthly,session}]
                      [--timezone str] [--time-format str]
                      [--theme {light,dark,classic,auto}]
                      [--custom-limit-tokens {int,null}] [--refresh-rate int]
                      [--refresh-per-second float] [--reset-hour {int,null}]
                      [--log-level str] [--log-file {Path,null}]
                      [--debug | --no-debug] [--version | --no-version]
                      [--clear | --no-clear]

claude-monitor - Real-time token usage monitoring for Claude AI

optional arguments:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --plan {pro,max5,max20,custom}
                        Plan type (pro, max5, max20, custom) (default: custom)
  --view {realtime,daily,monthly,session}
                        View mode (realtime, daily, monthly, session)
                        (default: realtime)
  --timezone str        Timezone for display (auto-detected from system).
                        Examples: UTC, America/New_York, Europe/London,
                        Europe/Warsaw, Asia/Tokyo, Australia/Sydney (default:
                        auto)
  --time-format str     Time format (12h or 24h, auto-detected from system)
                        (default: auto)
  --theme {light,dark,classic,auto}
                        Display theme (light, dark, classic, auto) (default:
                        auto)
  --custom-limit-tokens {int,null}
                        Token limit for custom plan (default: null)
  --refresh-rate int    Refresh rate in seconds (default: 10)
  --refresh-per-second float
                        Display refresh rate per second (0.1-20 Hz). Higher
                        values use more CPU (default: 0.75)
  --reset-hour {int,null}
                        Reset hour for daily limits (0-23) (default: null)
  --log-level str       Logging level (default: INFO)
  --log-file {Path,null}
                        Log file path (default: null)
  --debug, --no-debug   Enable debug logging (equivalent to --log-level DEBUG)
                        (default: False) (default: ==SUPPRESS==)
  --version, --no-version
                        Show version information (default: False) (default:
                        ==SUPPRESS==)
  --clear, --no-clear   Clear saved configuration (default: False) (default:
                        ==SUPPRESS==)
